main event: A civilian reported a UFO sighting in Ridgefield, Connecticut on December 11, 1962.
interesting points: The object was first noticed as a huge star shining in a dark sky,The object gave off a deep blue-green light around it,The sighting lasted for about 10 minutes,The object was described as moving slowly with a low steady hum,The witness estimated the object was traveling at speeds up to 700 mph.
sighted object: a long white object with a deep blue-green light
